ComicInfo.Summary:
WIth EXCLUSIVE DIGITAL CONTENT including original art and sketches!
Carpe DIEm are the world's seven greatest, color-coded assassins (one for each day of the week!).
This issue, the CARPEDIEM Agents must save their leader, Sir 8th Day, from an army of clowns, commanded by the fascist Clown Nazi!
